titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione, 1,8-bis(phenylthio)-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/11/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on 9,10-Anthracenedione, 1,8-bis (phenylthio).
